businessProfile.name: SLABpizza
businessProfile.address: 3430 N Ashton Blvd, Lehi, UT 84043, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 3430 N Ashton Blvd, Lehi, UT 84043, USA

reviews.text: Wonderful service, and very nice staff! They have quite the diverse selection of pizza and we received our food relatively quickly and it was pretty decent-comparable to a slightly better Costco pizza. One downside was the fountain machine having no ice. However I understand technical difficulties can occur! Overall, pretty fantastic!

What a fun experience! We enjoyed the BBQ, Pepperoni and Chicken Bacon Ranch. The cashier was friendly and the pizza came out in 15 minutes. Each pizza was delicious! We have plans to come back next weekend. Enjoy!

The pizza is good here.  It really is.  But the menu is different than the one by BYU.  And our favorite pizzas are no longer served at this location and it was a bummer to come into town from out of state and have a totally different menu from even the other locations.

I‚Äôve been here many times and have never been disappointed. My husband and I can eat here for less than $20 and the food is great. The hatch green Chile barbecue pizza is amazing and cheese bread is a MUST! Good portion sizes, plenty of room in the restaurant to just grab a quick bite or stay a while and hang out. Walking distance from BYU is a plus as well! Parking can be tough.

used to be my fam‚Äôs favorite pizza restaurant but we just ate there and idk if they changed the dough, recipe, or something but the pizza was so dry, overcooked, and didn‚Äôt taste good. also they like updated everything and the menu is so limited. maybe instead of changing the pizza you guys should get rid of those loud freaking chairs you‚Äôve had since 2010. cook or be cooked.

recentReviews.text:
Being at Slab Pizza in a city as great as Lehi is an incredible experience.

The view outside is pretty nice considering how close Lehi is to the lake and the scenery in Lehi. The restaurant itself is also very spacious.

The food is also very good! I didn't expect to get so much value out of $7. The "slabs" they serve are very well sized and delicious.

The salad was good too.

They also bring the food to you, which I think is very nice. Customer service is almost lost in our day and age and it's good to see they still have it here.

Definitely a frequenter for sure.
The potato pizza is perfect if you like dry pizza, I think they forgot the sauce? The water tastes like the smell of a toilet

It's fine.
Decent, quick pizza with some unique toppings. Atmosphere isn't much.

I can‚Äôt believe how much they had raised prices here. I understand inflation and how the current economy is crazy (grocery prices are unbelievable- thanks America) but some restaurants are just getting greedy and this place is one of them. - hence I‚Äôm taking an entire star off my review.
It smelled like sewage when we walked in. Every customer who was seated had an order number sign but no food. Turned around and left. We'll stick to the others locations.

Unfortunately, it seems its under new management, and they have really simplified the menu. They no longer make my 2 favorite pizza even though they have all the ingredients for other pizzas for it.  I asked if they could just make it even though it wasn't on the menu, but they said they are not allowed to.  I will not be craving slab as much as I once did.  However, they did add guarana to the fountain, so thats a plus.

detailedReviews.author: Bryan Lazo
detailedReviews.text:
Being at Slab Pizza in a city as great as Lehi is an incredible experience.

The view outside is pretty nice considering how close Lehi is to the lake and the scenery in Lehi. The restaurant itself is also very spacious.

The food is also very good! I didn't expect to get so much value out of $7. The "slabs" they serve are very well sized and delicious.

The salad was good too.

They also bring the food to you, which I think is very nice. Customer service is almost lost in our day and age and it's good to see they still have it here.

Definitely a frequenter for sure.

detailedReviews.author: Edgar Garcia
detailedReviews.text: The potato pizza is perfect if you like dry pizza, I think they forgot the sauce? The water tastes like the smell of a toilet

detailedReviews.author: Travis Isaacson
detailedReviews.text:
It's fine.
Decent, quick pizza with some unique toppings. Atmosphere isn't much.

detailedReviews.author: Meg Frisby
detailedReviews.text: I can‚Äôt believe how much they had raised prices here. I understand inflation and how the current economy is crazy (grocery prices are unbelievable- thanks America) but some restaurants are just getting greedy and this place is one of them. - hence I‚Äôm taking an entire star off my review.

detailedReviews.author: Trace Wilkinson
detailedReviews.text: Ramp local pizza is amazing

detailedReviews.author: Blake Young
detailedReviews.text: It smelled like sewage when we walked in. Every customer who was seated had an order number sign but no food. Turned around and left. We'll stick to the others locations.

detailedReviews.author: Camon Schneider
detailedReviews.text: Unfortunately, it seems its under new management, and they have really simplified the menu. They no longer make my 2 favorite pizza even though they have all the ingredients for other pizzas for it.  I asked if they could just make it even though it wasn't on the menu, but they said they are not allowed to.  I will not be craving slab as much as I once did.  However, they did add guarana to the fountain, so thats a plus.

detailedReviews.author: Morgan
detailedReviews.text: They no longer have my all time favorite pizza, the pizza that made me consider this place my favorite pizza place ... Chorizo, Potato and Egg.  I am devastated.

detailedReviews.author: Sam Rico
detailedReviews.text: Great food and great customer service! Bilingual staff make it a great experience for a more diverse community. Suri was especially helpful and made my visit even better.

detailedReviews.author: Jaclyn Hollingsworth
detailedReviews.text: used to be my fam‚Äôs favorite pizza restaurant but we just ate there and idk if they changed the dough, recipe, or something but the pizza was so dry, overcooked, and didn‚Äôt taste good. also they like updated everything and the menu is so limited. maybe instead of changing the pizza you guys should get rid of those loud freaking chairs you‚Äôve had since 2010. cook or be cooked.

detailedReviews.author: Christina Pearson
detailedReviews.text: The pizza is good here.  It really is.  But the menu is different than the one by BYU.  And our favorite pizzas are no longer served at this location and it was a bummer to come into town from out of state and have a totally different menu from even the other locations.

detailedReviews.author: Dionne Felix
detailedReviews.text: Super rico, diferente y delicioso, lo recomiendo al üíØ

detailedReviews.author: Bobby Helco
detailedReviews.text: Not great pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Regg Olsen
detailedReviews.text: Loved the pizza üçï!

detailedReviews.author: Kevin Thompson
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza joint. Will come back again.

detailedReviews.author: Josh Carter
detailedReviews.text: A bit expensive, but the Thai peanut pizza was actually super good

detailedReviews.author: Gregory Wirick
detailedReviews.text: I love Slab. It‚Äôs one of my favorite pizza places around. I get the UNM +mushroom

detailedReviews.author: Cortney Anderson (Lilblondy)
detailedReviews.text: Not good pizza. We tried 4 different kinds and it's just awful.

detailedReviews.author: Natasha Campilongo
detailedReviews.text: Delicious pizza and cheese bread. The Marinara was okay, but cold for our cheese bread, but I don't think it comes with it usually,  so maybe that's why. But the pizza was great and huge!

detailedReviews.author: Ismaryin Sotillo
detailedReviews.text: Me gust√≥ mucho la atenci√≥n del chico y el lugar

detailedReviews.author: Laura Montes de oca
detailedReviews.text: Atension, comida y precio, super y delicioso

detailedReviews.author: khanna kakarla
detailedReviews.text: Great food

detailedReviews.author: JPB
detailedReviews.text: Leaves you wondering what happened here???

detailedReviews.author: Oliver Frisbie
detailedReviews.text: Wonderful service, and very nice staff! They have quite the diverse selection of pizza and we received our food relatively quickly and it was pretty decent-comparable to a slightly better Costco pizza. One downside was the fountain machine having no ice. However I understand technical difficulties can occur! Overall, pretty fantastic!

detailedReviews.author: Dorraine Crump
detailedReviews.text: Absolutely loved this place!

detailedReviews.author: jesse oakeson
detailedReviews.text: Get the Rocket Cheese.  Wish they still played sports on their many TV's.

detailedReviews.author: Kaden Humphrey
detailedReviews.text: I‚Äôm only posting this cause there has to be some health code violations going on. Lady making the pizza has no gloves on and is touching her face, answers the phone and does a FaceTime, and then sets her phone down on the table where she is making pizza‚Ä¶ This place used to be great. I won‚Äôt be back. That‚Äôs gross.

detailedReviews.author: Matthew Chhay
detailedReviews.text:
Terrible customer service. I placed an order to-go and was given an order number sign to put on the table for them to bring out my order. I waited for over half an hour for my food and it was never brought out to me. I had to go up and ask where my food was, and it turns out it had been sitting in the "pick up order" warmer for who-knows-how-long. Not only did they fail to deliver my food properly, but they just ignored me the entire time. I know they had delivered other people's to-go orders because I saw them do it while I was there. I had been sitting in plain sight with an order number, obviously waiting for my order, and in that entire time they just ignored me and didn't bother to provide any kind of customer service.

As for why I waited half an hour without saying anything, it was a Saturday night and there were a few large parties seated in the dining area, so I assumed that they were busy and my food was in line behind the large parties. I didn't realize there was an issue until I saw a new person walk in and get their food within a few minutes. I had run out to the car to grab something after placing my order, so it's possible that they tried to first deliver my food in those few seconds I stepped outside, but that makes it even worse because that means the employees just ignored me for over 30 minutes when I'm clearly waiting for an order.

detailedReviews.author: Ariana D
detailedReviews.text: Not as good as they used to be. Service is slow and unorganized, the dining area is super loud (the chairs are extremely squeaky on the floor anytime anybody moves, and it echoes). We waited forever for our takeout food, then discovered the whole pizza was totally black on the underside when we got home.

detailedReviews.author: Tanner Jenson
detailedReviews.text: I showed up to order and there was no line, but the employee said they had a 30 minute wait so I turned around and left. It seems like they need better staffing which is unfortunate since I like the pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Gabriel Parma
detailedReviews.text: I had the Breakfast Pizza, and I cannot do it justice! It was so delicious, and was the first time I had egg on a pizza. The sausage and bacon were great, and the green chiles had just the right kick. Looking forward to coming back again, as this was already my second time!

detailedReviews.author: Ashley Christensen
detailedReviews.text: The pear salad and rosemary potato slab are amazing!!!

detailedReviews.author: Heidi Williams
detailedReviews.text: What happened to the slab pieces?  We got small round pizzas tonight.

detailedReviews.author: Jeff Stewart
detailedReviews.text: Pretty good pizza great price nice people üëç

detailedReviews.author: jonny
detailedReviews.text:
Overpriced for something worse than a DiGiorno's frozen pizza. They don't have the size of the pizza listed either it's just an arbitrary unit called a slab. It is served on a thin piece of wax paper.

Go to fat Daddy's in Provo or pizza pie underground in salt lake instead

detailedReviews.author: Randy Prazen
detailedReviews.text: What a fun experience! We enjoyed the BBQ, Pepperoni and Chicken Bacon Ranch. The cashier was friendly and the pizza came out in 15 minutes. Each pizza was delicious! We have plans to come back next weekend. Enjoy!

detailedReviews.author: Beau Graham
detailedReviews.text: The only reason this is four stars instead of five is because of price. I know inflation has hit every restaurant, but it feels like percentage wise slab is more expensive than other pizza places

detailedReviews.author: Jamar Knox
detailedReviews.text: Pizza toppings were okay, but the quality has diminished over years. I guess that come with the territory when trying to keep costs down. That's disappointing because I really used to like coming here. The crust wasn't very foldable and had a uninteresting, flavorless taste. Not very crowded, but the order took close to 20 minutes for 2 slices. Maybe the Provo location is better, but there are better pizza options in this corridor.

detailedReviews.author: TJ Ross
detailedReviews.text: This is by far the worst price pizza I have ever had and not very good. 60.00 for a pizza is way more than I have paid the pie pizza and pizza factory will continue to get my business. That's why they don't have pricing on there menu because if people new they wouldn't go

detailedReviews.author: Richard Ormiston
detailedReviews.text: Pretty mediocre everything. I payed almost twenty bucks for 1/4 a meat lovers pizza and a drink cup. It came on wax paper that soaked through the table. The staff didn‚Äôt ask once if I needed anything and still did the iPad tip question. I would choose anywhere that you can get a full pizza for $20. There‚Äôs nothing special about this place.

detailedReviews.author: Lucy Ross
detailedReviews.text: A mediocre pizza experience.

detailedReviews.author: Alma Rock
detailedReviews.text: Good pizza. Large portions. Pepperoni is a little bit spicy.

detailedReviews.author: Brad Wegelin
detailedReviews.text: Was here a long while ago. And I don‚Äôt recall it being this bad. The cashier could barely understand us and we weren‚Äôt whispering or talking abnormally or anything. I hate to blame it on English being a second language but that was clearly the issue, because she struggled to adequately answer our questions and relay the order back to us. Thankfully, we got what we ordered. But the cardboard-like crust ruined the whole ‚Äúslab.‚Äù On top of that, not only was the music extremely unpleasant at such a loud volume but they played the unfiltered vulgar versions of songs. (I was never a fan of Pitbull anyway.) And now, I‚Äôm definitely not a fan of SLAB.

detailedReviews.author: Rome Winnie
detailedReviews.text:
Pretty alright place, food took forever tho, didn't look amazing but tasted good.
Very thin crust
Which I hate

detailedReviews.author: Brittany Stewart
detailedReviews.text: The whole place reeks of natural gas. The staff is loud and somewhat obnoxious. I love their food, but I wish the overall experience in the shop was better.

detailedReviews.author: JLW
detailedReviews.text: Showed up at 9:38pm to a locked door, open signed turned off, and the chicks inside cleaning. Google says open till 10pm. Door says open till 10pm. Gave people 15/hr and now they don't wanna work.

detailedReviews.author: Kate Beckstead
detailedReviews.text: Online said store was open until 10, sign on store window said open until 10. We showed up at 9:05 on a Saturday and they were closed.

detailedReviews.author: Caleb ‚ÄúTarthorse‚Äù Drake
detailedReviews.text: It was amazing they give you a lot of pizza for what you pay and it is delicious I go the bufaloe wing pizza

detailedReviews.author: Vivian
detailedReviews.text: Tried really hard to like this location.  As I walked in, there was an unpleasant scent. Luckily, I wanted take-out and did not have to eat in.  My food was prepared pretty quickly, so that was great. But, the pizza was not very good because the crust was hard. The cheese, toppings  and sauce are so yummy, sadly the crust completely ruined it.

detailedReviews.author: Trevor Michaelis
detailedReviews.text: This time we took our food and drove away. We have stayed before. Now I am not a foodie by any means but it is good pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Jed Harston
detailedReviews.text: Good service is dead. A thing of the past. Floor was dirty. Not worth it.

detailedReviews.author: Isabel
detailedReviews.text: I got some Asian salad at Slab Pizza, the one with the peanut sauce... Absolutely most delicious salad ever. The cilantro was the perfect addition!

detailedReviews.author: Jordyn Hansen Burton
detailedReviews.text: I love the Provo location so was excited to try this one. The flavor was the same, but unfortunately the pizza was way over cooked. The crust was very tough and hard to chew.

detailedReviews.author: Cody Mortensen
detailedReviews.text: I used to love this place. They wouldn‚Äôt answer the phone when I called, and the whole staff is back goofing around while I wait 40 minutes for my pizza. I am one of two people in the restaurant.

detailedReviews.author: Tamilisa Miner
detailedReviews.text: Nice place for a quick lunch. The salads are nice and full. The cheese bread was good. Nothing too fancy.

detailedReviews.author: Javiana Waits
detailedReviews.text:
The customer service in this slab is the worst ever!!!!!!
I don‚Äôt recommend it at all.

detailedReviews.author: Matt S
detailedReviews.text: Great food some of my favorite pizza in the area. Everything is good and you get these giant pieces for slices. Would recommend.

detailedReviews.author: Grant Peterson
detailedReviews.text: Price was normal for fast casual, so a little more than you normally want to pay for lunch. Serving size was good, food was quite tasty. Decor was very minimal at this location, but that didn't really detract from the meal.

detailedReviews.author: Jonathan Ulmer
detailedReviews.text: $16+ for what amounts to half a pizza and the crust was terrible. Inedible resembling cardboard, toppings were very thin and salty. Price doesn't match the quality.

detailedReviews.author: Jeremy Conterio (i_personally_believe)
detailedReviews.text: Love slab! Yes yummy pizzas. Get the chicken bacon ranch.

detailedReviews.author: Wilson Simons
detailedReviews.text: We loved our experience at slab pizza. So many different pizzas options to choose from. Will be back!

detailedReviews.author: Jason Mortensen
detailedReviews.text:
$10+ for a single slice of pizza!!

Save your money and go anywhere else, it‚Äôs not that good and the vibe is nonexistent.
What happen to this place?

detailedReviews.author: Clint Calder
detailedReviews.text: The crust tasted like gummy saltine crackers. My brother and I were super hungry going in, walked out having eaten a quarter of the food that we just threw away. Could be the crust didn‚Äôt rise, we don‚Äôt know but it was more like crackers and a little bit of crusty cheese than anything else. We ordered the cheese bread and pepperoni pizza. Seemed like a basic order, but we won‚Äôt be going back.

detailedReviews.author: John Sutherland
detailedReviews.text: Pizza crusts are premade, tough and tasteless. Service was slow. So disappointed.

detailedReviews.author: Robert Lohman
detailedReviews.text: Delicious pizza that is very thin and yummy. I recommend the chicken bacon ranch. Some might think that this is pricy but I don't you pay for what you get (I really like there üçï)

detailedReviews.author: Chase Kemp
detailedReviews.text: Great food but this location is understaffed and it's always VERY slow for a work lunch üêå

detailedReviews.author: ami hodges
detailedReviews.text: Convinced my coworkers to order SLAB for our Saturday lunch and they were happily surprised by the buffalo pizza they ordered; however, their favorite was the Meikel I ordered. The manager was very patient in explaining things and taking down our order. The only downside was that they didn't have drink carriers, but the manager was kind enough to help me carry the drinks out to the car.

detailedReviews.author: Dallin H
detailedReviews.text: The pizza is really good when it‚Äôs fresh. As it gets cold, it gets a bit chewy. Workers are always friendly. The lunch hour gets busy and it can be hard to find a spot.

detailedReviews.author: Fletcher Chambers
detailedReviews.text: The crust was cracker thin. Not my favorite but it was okay.

detailedReviews.author: Geoffrey Layton
detailedReviews.text: Excellent pizza by an excellent owner. I love this place. It's so good. Just thinking about it makes me hungry

detailedReviews.author: LJK AZ
detailedReviews.text: Good food with great variety of pizza and salad options. Friendly people. Atmosphere isn‚Äôt fancy - like a cafeteria.

detailedReviews.author: Noble Dunn
detailedReviews.text: I like SLAB quite a bit. Fun/unique portion model. I used to go to the one just off BYU‚Äôs campus when I went there. I particularly like the crust but the quality of all their ingredients is good.

detailedReviews.author: Adam Bettis
detailedReviews.text: Great price for your own creation with any toppings you want! Anytime I've been there, the staff are friendly and helpful. The rosemary crust is a nice touch, and they have some unique toppings that make the experience better than with your run-of-the-mill pizza place.

detailedReviews.author: Robert Janzen
detailedReviews.text: A ‚Äúslab‚Äù is quite large, and is sliced into 3 pieces. maybe I should‚Äôve got something besides just pepperoni pizza, but it was fine, nothing special. The small garden salad was the biggest $5 salad I have ever had. But with the dressing, nothing special. Just my opinion.

detailedReviews.author: Jonathan Eaton
detailedReviews.text:
They really need to add changing tables to the bathrooms. It‚Äôs a huge problem for parents with young children when the bathrooms don‚Äôt have a place to change diapers, and even though the food is great, it‚Äôs a big enough problem for me that I won‚Äôt be going back.

On another note, I don‚Äôt love that the slices are served on a piece of paper. My wife‚Äôs slice soaked the paper and tore through, so her piece was just on the table.

detailedReviews.author: Brian Cameron
detailedReviews.text: He the Ramp Local... You won't regret it. It's spicy but such a unique taste you won't find anywhere else!

detailedReviews.author: George List
detailedReviews.text: I was hoping they wouldn't be so skimpy on the toppings.

detailedReviews.author: J L
detailedReviews.text: Used to love eating here, but now very dirty looking people making the food and handling it without gloves on, AFTER it comes out of the oven, including fresh vegetables being put on top cold after comes out of oven being handled with dirty, bare hands. Gross.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customer opinions are divided. The 3.5/5 rating from 100 recent reviews suggests some great experiences mixed with areas needing attention.

strengthsPerceived: Customers appreciate the generous portion sizes and delicious taste of the "slabs" offered at a great value, with many mentioning the $7 price point. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The exceptional customer service, including food delivery to tables and bilingual staff, creates a welcoming and diverse dining experience. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
Unique and diverse pizza toppings, such as the Thai peanut pizza, are a standout feature that customers love. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
improvementOpportunities: Negative reviews and reputation issues, including complaints about hygiene and customer service - review management can address this concern
Lack of atmosphere/ambiance awareness, such as complaints about the dining area's noise and lack of sports on TV - social media marketing can improve this area
Long wait times and service issues, including unorganized service and delayed food delivery - Boostly marketing services can improve this

positive.author: Bryan Lazo
positive.text:
Being at Slab Pizza in a city as great as Lehi is an incredible experience.

The view outside is pretty nice considering how close Lehi is to the lake and the scenery in Lehi. The restaurant itself is also very spacious.

The food is also very good! I didn't expect to get so much value out of $7. The "slabs" they serve are very well sized and delicious.

The salad was good too.

They also bring the food to you, which I think is very nice. Customer service is almost lost in our day and age and it's good to see they still have it here.

Definitely a frequenter for sure.

positive.author: Travis Isaacson
positive.text:
It's fine.
Decent, quick pizza with some unique toppings. Atmosphere isn't much.

positive.author: Meg Frisby
positive.text: I can‚Äôt believe how much they had raised prices here. I understand inflation and how the current economy is crazy (grocery prices are unbelievable- thanks America) but some restaurants are just getting greedy and this place is one of them. - hence I‚Äôm taking an entire star off my review.

neutral.author: Christina Pearson
neutral.text: The pizza is good here.  It really is.  But the menu is different than the one by BYU.  And our favorite pizzas are no longer served at this location and it was a bummer to come into town from out of state and have a totally different menu from even the other locations.

neutral.author: Jamar Knox
neutral.text: Pizza toppings were okay, but the quality has diminished over years. I guess that come with the territory when trying to keep costs down. That's disappointing because I really used to like coming here. The crust wasn't very foldable and had a uninteresting, flavorless taste. Not very crowded, but the order took close to 20 minutes for 2 slices. Maybe the Provo location is better, but there are better pizza options in this corridor.

negative.author: Edgar Garcia
negative.text: The potato pizza is perfect if you like dry pizza, I think they forgot the sauce? The water tastes like the smell of a toilet

negative.author: Blake Young
negative.text: It smelled like sewage when we walked in. Every customer who was seated had an order number sign but no food. Turned around and left. We'll stick to the others locations.

negative.author: Camon Schneider
negative.text: Unfortunately, it seems its under new management, and they have really simplified the menu. They no longer make my 2 favorite pizza even though they have all the ingredients for other pizzas for it.  I asked if they could just make it even though it wasn't on the menu, but they said they are not allowed to.  I will not be craving slab as much as I once did.  However, they did add guarana to the fountain, so thats a plus.

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
